CIPHER.49.cipherString: Guard your heart, mind and time. Those three things will determine the health of everything else in your life.
CIPHER.49.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Andrena Sawyer.

CIPHER.50.cipherString: Everything is vague to a degree you do not realize till you have tried to make it precise.
CIPHER.50.question: Decode this quote by Bertrand Russell which has been encoded using the Atbash cipher.

CIPHER.51.cipherString: Success may require a lot of days. But progress only requires one.
CIPHER.51.question: The following quote by T. Jay Taylor has been encoded with the Vigenère Cipher using a very common four letter word for the key. The deciphered text ends with ESONE.

CIPHER.52.cipherString: Science is a good thing. News reporters are good things too. But it's never a good idea to put them in the same room.
CIPHER.52.question: Decode this aristocrat which is a quote by Scott Adams that contains the word ROOM.

CIPHER.53.cipherString: You aren't doing 'nothing' when you choose to put your wellbeing first. In fact, this is the key to having everything.
CIPHER.53.question: Decode this quote by Brittany Burgunder which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.54.cipherString: If you cannot solve a problem, ask someone who knows.
CIPHER.54.question: Decode this quote by Eraldo Banovac.

CIPHER.55.cipherString: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
CIPHER.55.question: A quote by Albert Einstein has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote ends with ALUE.

CIPHER.56.cipherString: Once you have explored a fear, it becomes less terrifying. Part of courage comes from extending our knowledge.
CIPHER.56.question: A quote by Duke Leto Atreides has been encoded as an Aristocrat in which the word LESS appears once.

CIPHER.57.cipherString: Light generates life and causes it to grow.
CIPHER.57.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●, 2=●, 6=×, 7=●, 8=–, 9=×

CIPHER.58.cipherString: I'm not stubborn. My way is just better.
CIPHER.58.question: The following quote by Maya Banks has been encoded using the Affine Cipher. You are told that A decodes to be R and X decodes to be I

CIPHER.59.cipherString: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
CIPHER.59.question: A quote by Mahatma Gandhi has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.60.cipherString: Siempre he sido muy unilateral con respecto a la ciencia, y cuando era más joven, concentré casi todo mi esfuerzo en ella.
CIPHER.60.question: A quote by Richard Feynman has been translated to Spanish and encoded as an Aristocrat with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  What was it encoded as?
CIPHER.60.translation: I've always been very one-sided about science, and when I was younger, I concentrated almost all my effort on it.

CIPHER.61.cipherString: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
CIPHER.61.question: A quote by Luis Chaluisan has been encoded with a Baconian cipher.  What does it say?

CIPHER.62.cipherString: The only joy in the world is to begin.
CIPHER.62.question: The following phrase by Cesare Pavese has been encoded using an Affine cipher where a=9 and b=4.  What does it say?

CIPHER.63.cipherString: Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!
CIPHER.63.question: A quote by Roald Dahl has been encoded as an Aristocrat and encoded using a K1 keyword.  The word OF appears twice in the quote.

CIPHER.64.cipherString: We have normality. I repeat, we have normality. Anything you still can't cope with is therefore your own problem.
CIPHER.64.question: Decode the following quote by Douglas Adams which has been encoded as an Aristocrat.

CIPHER.65.cipherString: Never take life for granted. Savor every sunrise, because no one is promised tomorrow…or even the rest of today.
CIPHER.65.question: Decode this quote by Eleanor Brownn which has been encoded using a Caeasr cipher.

CIPHER.66.cipherString: Sometimes the only way to ever find yourself is to get completely lost.
CIPHER.66.question: A quote by Kellie Elmore has been encoded using a RailFence cipher using either 2,3 or 4 rails.  The phrase WAY TO appears once in the decoded quote.

CIPHER.67.cipherString: I am too much of a skeptic to deny the possibility of anything.
CIPHER.67.question: The following quote by T.H. Huxley needs to be decoded with the Vigenère Cipher with a keyword of FERNS

CIPHER.68.cipherString: A tiger only needs three things to be comfortable. Lots of food, sleep, and…actually, no it's just those two things.
CIPHER.68.question: A quote by Colleen Houck has been encoded as an Aristocrat in which the words TO and TWO both appear exactly once.

CIPHER.69.cipherString: I just got out of the hospital. I was in a speed reading accident. I hit a book mark and flew across the room.
CIPHER.69.question: A quote by Steven Wright has been encode as an Aristocrat for you to decode.  What does it say?

CIPHER.70.cipherString: Reputation is what other people know about you. Honor is what you know about yourself.
CIPHER.70.question: The following strange headlines are a Baconian cipher of a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold which starts with REPUT.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.71.cipherString: Win or lose, you are trying, that's what matters.
CIPHER.71.question: A quote by Avina Celeste has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WINO.

CIPHER.72.cipherString: Success means we go to sleep at night knowing that our talents and ablities were used in a way that served others.
CIPHER.72.question: A quote by Marianne Williamson which has the word THAT in it once has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What does it say?

CIPHER.73.cipherString: Our obstacles are tough, so are our potentials. If we don't unleash our potentials, our obstacles will cripple us!
CIPHER.73.question: Decode this quote by Israelmore Ayivor which has been encoded using a Caesar cipther.

CIPHER.74.cipherString: The function of freedom is to free someone else.
CIPHER.74.question: Decode this quote by Toni Morrison which has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher. You are told that 1=●×, 2=●–, 3=×–, 4=××, 5=●●, 6=×●
